name: Pressure Temple Ruins
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Top-down tactical map: Pressure Temple Ruins, 30x30 squares at 140 px per square (140 DPI), 30x30, distinct patterns for passable / impassable / difficult, collapses, rips, currents; marked clearly, multiple routes and flanking options, ramps, stairs, ledges, or contour lines, bold lines for walls/obstacles; fine lines for textures; high-contrast grid, icons only; no text labels; VTT-ready export, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., No embedded text labels; use icons and clear linework only. Reserve clean margins and text-safe areas for VTT overlays. Render grid and numeric ticks crisply; avoid stylized fonts entirely., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Top-down tactical map of Pressure Temple Ruins.
revised_prompt: Generate a painterly image in a heroic medieval-fantasy style of a tabletop board. This is the 'Pressure Temple Ruins,' using an overhead perspective. The map should have a distinct size, 30x30 squares with a resolution of 140 pixels per square. The top-down tactical map illustrates passable, impassable, and difficult terrains with distinct patterns. Include features such as ramps, staircases, ledges, and contour lines, and various flanking options. Decorate it with an aquatic theme, incorporating a palette of teals, deep blues, sea-greens with pearl highlights. Do not embed any text labels, and avoid any elements of modern signage, sci-fi interfaces, photoreal CGI, anime style, or glaring bloom. Please also keep a clear margin and maintain areas suitable for VTT overlays.
